alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:31AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian, northeastern Pushmataha and Le Flore Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1231 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Fanshawe to 9 miles south of Whitesboro. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Cameron... Octavia... Talimena State Park... Big Cedar... Lake Wister State Park... Whitesboro... Muse... Summerfield... Heavener Runestone Park... Hodgen... Honobia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
